The Quranic researcher said to the Almighty: the newspapers of Abraham and Moses in which they said: One of them: that it is a bay of his saying: in the first newspapers.The second: that what is meant is that it is mentioned in the newspapers of all the prophets from which the newspapers of Abraham and Moses (P-136) narrated from Abu Dhir that he asked the Messenger of God And he said: a hundred and four books on Adam, one of the newspapers, and on the two chapters, and on the age of thirty Sahara, and on the authority of Ibrahim And Zabur and Al -Faraqan.May God bless our master Muhammad and his family and his companions.
